name: Release

on:
  release:
    types:
      - published

jobs:
  # docker:
  #   runs-on: ubuntu-latest
  #   permissions:
  #     contents: write
  #     id-token: write
  #     packages: write
  #   env:
  #     IMAGE_NAME: ghcr.io/rdflib/prez-ui
  #   steps:
  npm:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Install pnpm
        uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
        with:
          version: 9
          run_install: false
      - name: Install Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'pnpm'
      - name: Install workspace
        run: pnpm install
      - name: Build package
        run: pnpm build
      - name: Publish to GitHub NPM Registry
        run: pnpm publish -r --publish-branch jamie/next/shad-layer-fix --no-git-checks
        env:
          NODE_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_TOKEN }}
